page.title: 14 LEISURE FACILITIES
page.content: Out of 100 people in this age range,we found that about 25% choose{reading}as a favourite indoor occupation.The town has bowling,soccer,rugby,hockey,golf, netball,tennis and squash clubs. For people up to 30,{soccer}is the most popular outdoor activity.About 60% of the over 30s' spend most of their spare time{gardening.}With good sports facilities,all forms of sport rank high with people up to 50.Ladies can enjoy{keep fit,}yoga and aerobics through the day.Political and social clubs and pubs have snooker,pool and darts every day.Over 1 tenth of the teenagers play instruments,listen to tapes and have home{computers.}All forms of craft from model and lace making to knitting are main hobbies for over 50s.The town band,choirs, discos,folk_dancing,stamp,camera, computer and railway{clubs}flourish.
